meanings.definition: To feature on the front page of a website or publication.
meanings.sent1: The website frontpaging the latest news made it easy to find.
meanings.sent2: She frontpaged her blog post to attract more readers.
meanings.sent3: Frontpaging the recipe for chocolate cake was a smart move.
meanings.sent4: His article frontpaging the event was like a spotlight on the news.
meanings.sent5: Frontpaging important announcements ensures they are seen by everyone.

meanings.definition: The act of promoting a post or article to the front page of a website.
meanings.sent1: The frontpaging of his blog post brought it to everyone's attention.
meanings.sent2: She was excited about the frontpaging of her article.
meanings.sent3: The frontpaging of the funny cat video was well-deserved.
meanings.sent4: The frontpaging of the blog post was like a promotion for the writer.
meanings.sent5: Frontpaging a story can increase its visibility and reach.

meanings.definition: The process of selecting content to be displayed prominently on a website.
meanings.sent1: The frontpaging of the new products was carefully done.
meanings.sent2: Frontpaging involves choosing the most important content.
meanings.sent3: The frontpaging of the travel section made readers dream of vacations.
meanings.sent4: In the digital world, frontpaging is like curating a gallery.
meanings.sent5: Frontpaging requires a keen eye for what will grab attention.
